channel.title: World Map
channel.description: Is their some way you can add a World map to your website?? if their isent its fine :L

item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

not possible cause the rs map always updating so there would have to be alot of maps uploaded 1 for each map change

Read full topic

item.title: World Map
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Probably not easily. You’d probably have to read the cache, save the raw image data, and upload that.

That is, if I remember that being how it’s handled in the client. If it just saves the ground data(loc.dat) then you’d probably have to convert the ground data to colors, either a 1:1 or 1:2 ratio might suffice, and then have each tile be a 1x1 or 2x2 block in the image.

This may be of some use: http://up.ht/gTWFwT

Read full topic
